Verses: 1 nammudaiya Ratchagaraayirukkira Dhevanum, Nammudaiya Nambikkaiyaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvum Kattalaiyittapadiye, Yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaayirukkira Pavul,

2 visuvaasaththil Uththama Kumaaranaagiya Theemoththeyuvukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvinaalum Kirubaiyum Irakkamum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

3 vetrumaiyaana Ubadhesangalaip Podhiyaadhapadikkum, Visuvaasaththinaal Vilangum Dheyveega Bakdhiviruththikku Edhuvaayiraamal, Tharkkangalukku Edhuvaayirukkira Kattukkadhaigalaiyum Mudivillaadha Vamsavaralaarugalaiyum Gavaniyaadhapadikkum, Nee Silarukkuk Kattalaiyidumporuttaaga,
4 naan Makkedhoniyaavukkup Pogumpodhu Unnai Ebesu Pattanaththilirukka Vendikkondapadiye Seyvaayaaga.
5 karpanaiyin Porul Ennavenil, Suththamaana Irudhayaththilum Nalmanasaatchiyilum Maayamatra Visuvaasaththilum Pirakkum Anbe.
6 ivaigalai Silar Nokkaamal Veenpechchukku Idankoduththu Vilagipponaargal.
7  Thaangal Sollugiradhu Innadhendrum, Thaangal Saadhikkiradhu Innadhendrum Ariyaadhirundhum, Niyaayappiramaana Podhagaraayirukka Virumpugiraargal.
8 oruvan Niyaayappiramaanaththai Niyaayappadi Anusariththaal, Niyaayappiramaanam Nalladhendru Arindhirukkirom.

9 engalukkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Niyaayappiramaanam Needhimaanukku Vidhikkappadaamal, Akkiramakkaararukkum, Adangaadhavargalukkum, Bakthiyillaadhavargalukkum, Paavigalukkum, Asuththarukkum, Seerkettavargalukkum, Thaaithagappanmaarai Adikkiravargalukkum, Kolaipaadhagarukkum,
10 vesikkallarukkum, Aanpunarchchikkaararukkum, Manusharaith Thirudugiravargalukkum, Poiyarukkum, Poiyaanai Idugiravarkalukkum,

11 niththiyaanandha Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyaana Suviseshaththinpadi Enakku Oppuvikkappattirukkira Aarokkiyamaana Ubadhesaththirku Edhiridaiyaayirukkira Matrendha Seygaikkum Virodhamaai Vidhikkappattirukkiradhu.
12 ennaip Balappaduththugira Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Ennai Unmaiyullavanendrenni, Indha Oozhiyaththirku Erpaduththinapadiyaal, Avarai Sthoththirikkiren.
13 munne Naan Dhooshikkiravanum, Thunbappaduththugiravanum, Kodumai Seygiravanumaayirundhen; Appadiyirundhum, Naan Ariyaamal Avisuvaasaththinaale Appadiseydhapadiyinaal Irakkampetren.
14 nammudaiya Karththarin Kirubai Kiristhu Yesuvinmelulla Visuvaasaththodum Anbodunkooda Ennidaththil Paripooranamaaip Perugitru.
15 paavigalai Ratchikka Kiristhu Yesu Ulagaththil Vandhaar Engira Vaarththai Unmaiyum Ellaa Angigarippukkum Paaththiramumaanadhu; Avargalil Piradhaana Paavi Naan.

16 appadiyirundhum, Niththiya Jeevanai Adaiyumpadi Inimel Yesukiristhuvinidaththil Visuvaasamaayiruppavargalukkuth Thirushtaandham Undaagumporuttup Piradhaana Paaviyaagiya Ennidaththil Avar Ellaa Neediya Porumaiyaiyum Kaanbikkumpadikku Irakkampetren.
17 niththiyamum Azhivillaamaiyum Adharisanamumulla Raajanumaai, Thaamoruvare Gnaanamulla Dhevanumaayirukkiravarukku, Ganamum Magimaiyum Sadhaakaalangalilum Undaayiruppadhaaga. Aamen.

18 kumaaranaagiya Theemoththeyuve, Unnaikkuriththu Mun Undaana Theerkkadharisanangalinpadiye, Nee Avaigalai Munnittu Nalla Poraattampannumpadi, Indhak Kattalaiyai Unakku Oppuvikkiren; Nee Visuvaasamum Nalmanasaatchiyum Udaiyavanaayiru.
19 indha Nalmanasaatchiyai Silar Thallivittu, Visuvaasamaagiya Kappalai Sedhappaduththinaargal.
20 imeneyum Aleksandharum Appadippattavargal; Avargal Dhooshiyaadhapadi Sitchikkappada Avargalai Saaththaanidaththil Oppukkoduththen.
